message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I'm sure it will be a great asset to your business.  My starting price is $1,750,000.  This reflects the value and potential of the product.  I'm confident we can find a price that works for both of us.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit too pricey. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'd like to offer $1,250,000 for the product.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $1,250,000 is a little too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit more, but I need to be closer to $1,600,000 to make this work.  I'm confident this product will be worth every penny for you.
I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'd like to offer $1,400,000 for the product.
Bob, I'm getting closer to your offer, but I still need a bit more. $1,450,000 is my final offer. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. I'm confident we can make this work.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $1,375,000, but no higher. I hope we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.
